title.native: ギルドの受付嬢ですが、残業は嫌なのでボスをソロ討伐しようと思います
title.romaji: Guild no Uketsukejou desu ga, Zangyou wa Iya nanode Boss wo Solo Toubatsu Shiyou to Omoimasu
title.english: I May Be a Guild Receptionist, but I’ll Solo Any Boss to Clock Out on Time

description:
Alina thought she had found the perfect job as a guild receptionist. It’s stable, safe, and has a super cute uniform. But this dream gig turns into an overtime nightmare whenever adventurers get stuck clearing a dungeon. Tired of the long nights, Alina starts taking down the bosses herself! She even earns the name Executioner for her impressive skills. Can she keep her identity a secret?

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Office Lady
tags.description: Prominently features a female office worker or OL.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Body Horror
tags.description: Features characters who undergo horrific transformations or disfigurement, often to their own detriment.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

name.native: ジェイド・スクレイド
ルルリ・アシュフォード
ヘルフレイムドラゴン

node.description: Background Artist affiliated with studio Stereotype Smartile.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/skm2y_1121)

Director of the Photography Department at [CloverWorks](https://anilist.co/studio/6222/CloverWorks).

After moving to Tokyo, Sakuma initially joined Azuhata Production, where he gained some experience before joining [A-1 Pictures](https://anilist.co/studio/561/) in 2009. There he took part in the production of [Welcome to the Space Show](https://anilist.co/anime/8115/), and later made his debut as director of photography on [Saint Onii-san](https://anilist.co/anime/15775/).

__[Website](https://www.tsubasanium.com/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tsubasacurry)__ 

__Tsubasa Itou__ is a Japanese composer, arranger and orchestrator.

streamingEpisodes.title: Episode 12 - I May Be a Guild Receptionist, But I'll Fight to the Bitter End to Get Out of Working Overtime
Episode 11 - It May Be a Trap, but I Have to Keep Moving Forward
Episode 10 - A Ghost May Show Up During Training, but Nobody Told Me About It
Episode 9 - I May Be in My Third Year as a Guild Receptionist, but I'm Starting New-Employee Training
Episode 8 - I May Be a Useless Healer, but I'm Going to Do Everything I Can
Episode 7 - I've Waited Forever for the Centennial Festival, so I'm Gonna Enjoy It, No Matter What
Episode 6 - I May Be Silver Sword's Back Attacker, but I'm Gonna Catch the Jerk Who Started That Rumor
Episode 5 - I May Be Silver Sword's Healer, but Even I Could Use Some Healing
Episode 4 - Relics, Secret Quests, and Dark Gods Keep Interfering with My Work, so I'll Destroy Them All
Episode 3 - I May Be Silver Sword's Tank, but I Want to Take On a Really Tough Dungeon
Episode 2 - I May Be the Executioner, but I'll Be Fired if People Find Out, so I'll Have to Use Force
Episode 1 - I'm a Guild Receptionist, so I Want a Peaceful Life
